oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dataset for "Drought stress leads to systemic induced susceptibility to a nectrotrophic fungus associated with mountain pine beetle in Pinus banksiana seedlings"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Klutsch, Jennifer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This dataset is from a study that investigated the impact of drought on induced defenses from initial attack and resistance to subsequent biotic attacks in greenhouse grown jack pine seedlings.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Medicine, Health and Life Sciences
defense chemistry
Dendroctonus ponderosae
plant-microbe interactions
